name: Ascension (Picardo_Sanchez)
description:
Hey ! Have fun on this 3d parkour platformer, tell me what you think about it in the comment section .

Inputs :

- Movement : ZQSD + mouse

- Sprint : Shift

- Jump : Space

- Dash : Left Clic

Exit Game : Escape

Reload Game : Enter

music credits : スタートアップ国 startup nation by Anonymous420
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Anonymous420/________________________________...
